summary.description: bamf_nnunet_mr_prostate model is a semantic segmentation model where an NNUnet model is finetuned for MR images

inputs.label: Input Image
inputs.description: The MR scan of a patient

details.name: AIMI MR Prostate
details.type: nnU-Net (U-Net structure, optimized by data-driven heuristics)
details.cite: Murugesan, Gowtham Krishnan, Diana McCrumb, Mariam Aboian, Tej Verma, Rahul Soni, Fatima Memon, and Jeff Van Oss. The AIMI Initiative: AI-Generated Annotations for Imaging Data Commons Collections. arXiv preprint arXiv:2310.14897 (2023).

publications.title: The AIMI Initiative: AI-Generated Annotations in IDC Collections

use.title: Intended Use
use.text: This model is intended to perform segmentations of prostate region in MR scans. The model has been trained and tested on scans aquired during clinical care of patients, so it might not be suited for a healthy population. The generalization capabilities of the model on a range of ages, genders, and ethnicities are unknown.

analyses.title: Quantitative Analyses
analyses.text: The model's performance was assessed using the Dice Coefficient and Normalized Surface Distance (NSD) with tolerance 7mm, as specified in the MR prostate segmentation task in the Medical Segmentation Decathlon challenge. The model was used to segment cases from the IDC collection ProstateX [1]. Thirty four of those cases were reviewed and corrected by a board-certified radiologist and a non-expert. The analysis is published here [2]

tables.label: Label-wise metrics (mean (standard deviation)) between AI derived and manually corrected MR prostate annotations

references.label: The AIMI Initiative: AI-Generated Annotations for Imaging Data Commons Collections

evaluation.title: Evaluation Data
evaluation.text: The model was used to segment cases from the PROSTATEx dataset. A test/holdout validation split of 81/34 was created from the 115 prostates. These were reviewed and corrected by a board-certified radiologist. The model predictions, and radiologist corrections are published on zenodo [2]

references.label: Image segmentations produced by the AIMI Annotations initiative

training.title: Training Data
training.text: The training dataset consists of 439 T2W MRI prostate annotations taken from IDC [1] (N=98), ProstateX dataset found publicly [2] (N=134), T2W MRI scans from Prostate158 [3] (N=138), and ISBI-MR-Prostate-2013 dataset [4] (N=69)
